SourceProxy.label: Phasta Reader
SourceProxy.name: PhastaSyncIOReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads the parallel Phasta meta-file and the underlying Phasta files.
Documentation.short_help: Read datasets stored in the Phasta format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This Phasta reader reads files stored in the Phasta (a CFD package) format. The expected file extension is .phts. The output of this reader is a multipiece data set.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Phasta reader.
